title: CONSERVATION EDUCATION AND OUTREACH TECHNIQUES
description: Author: Susan K. Jacobson, Martha Monroe Edition: 2 edition Publication Date: November 1, 2015 Publisher: Oxford University Press ISBN-10: 0198716699 ISBN-13: 978-0198716693 Pages: 428 pages Format: pdf Size: 17M --- The conservation of biological diversity depends on people`s knowledge and actions. This book presents the theory and practice for creating effective education and outreach programmes for conservation. The authors describe an exciting array of techniques for enhancing school resources, marketing environmental messages, using social media, developing partnerships for conservation, and designing on-site programmes for parks and community centres. Vivid case studies from around the world illustrate techniques and describe planning, implementation, and evaluation procedures, enabling readers to implement their own new ideas effectively. --- http://dlfeb.com/book/conservation-education-and-outreach-techniques-techniques-in-ecology-conservation/
